author: Justin Tinsley
description: As LeBron James embarks on his ninth Eastern Conference finals since 2007, we look back at a pair of his most legendary road contests. This, the first of a two-part series, travels back to Game 5 o…
title: The King is crowned: the true and actual arrival of LeBron James

author: Brian WindhorstESPN Senior Writer
description: With LeBron James dominating inside early and Kevin Love netting a playoff high in scoring, the Cavs rolled in Game 1 against the East's No. 1 seed.
title: LeBron James, Cavaliers open East finals by shutting down Celtics

author: Alysha Tsuji
description: LeBron James was not satisfied after the Cavs' dominant 117-104 win in Game 1 of the East finals.
title: LeBron James after dominant Game 1 win: 'I didn't feel that great'

author: Justin Tinsley
description: As LeBron James embarks on his ninth Eastern Conference finals since 2007, we look back at a pair of his most legendary road contests. This, the second of a two-part series (part one is here) trave…
title: The King takes his throne: LeBron James’ personal 2012 Game 6 victory over the Celtics

description: Auch die Boston Celtics haben Basketball-Superstar LeBron James nicht gestoppt. Der US-Amerikaner war beim ungefährdeten 117:104 (61:39)-Sieg seiner Cleveland Cavaliers zum Auftakt der Halbfinal-Playoffs beim NBA-Rekordchampion mit 38 Punkten einmal mehr der überragende Mann.
title: Basketball: NBA-Playoffs: LeBron James überragt bei Cleveland-Sieg

author:
Dieter Kurtenbach                    

                                    
                        @dkurtenbach
description: Boston just needs to wait out LeBron James.
title: The Celtics are playing a long-term game against the Cavs and look poised to win it | FOX Sports

description: Everything you need to know before LeBron James & Co. take on the Boston Celtics.
title: 5 big questions ahead of the Cavaliers-Celtics Eastern Conference finals | FOX Sports

description: Cleveland's LeBron James has been named to the All-NBA first team for a record-tying 11th time, and Houston's James Harden is the lone player to be a unanimous first-team selection this season.
title: LeBron is All-NBA for record-tying 11th time

author: Chris ForsbergESPN Staff Writer
description: The Celtics had no answer to LeBron James on Wednesday night, and Boston coach Brad Stevens said he might consider double-teaming him, a risky option against a star-studded Cavs team.
title: Celtics' Stevens: LeBron keeps getting better

author: NBA InsidersESPN.com
description: Will Isaiah Thomas or Kyrie Irving have the better series? Can the Celtics slow down LeBron James? Our 5-on-5 crew breaks down Cleveland-Boston and predicts the winner.
title: 5-on-5 predictions: Can Celtics upset LeBron and the Cavs?
